svg.text: D:\360yun\github.gcj\Python.learn\module\svgwrite\examples\ltattrie\text_font_generic_famil.svg: Example of text using generic family fonts
font_family='serif': have finishing strokes, flared or tapering ends.
font_family='sans-serif': have stroke endings that are plain.
font_family='cursive': the characters are partially or completely connected
font_family='monospace': all characters have the same fixed width.
